subject: Creating "views"
msgSnippet: Dear I created for our project a factory returning say about 10 classes implementing the same interface.I wanted to test the factory  & the instances returned
messageBody:
Dear I created for our project a factory returning say about 10 classes
implementing the same interface.I wanted to test the factory & the instances returned in my TestSuite.
I was wandering if there was any possibility to create different views on
the TestCases.
What I mean is introduce the TestCase in 2 different suites so the
"report" would show result on :1°. All the Interfaces & for each every method test case result
2°. Every method & for each the results for every interfaces.

Any idea on how to make thisproperly would eb appreciated.

Tia,

\T,


--
Thomas SMETS
rue J. Wytsmanstraat 62
1050 Brussels
